citeinfo.title: PublicGIS.GISADMIN.FireStationPoints
citeinfo.othercit: This information is not for distribution at this time.

descript.abstract: Fire Station Locations Gaston County, NCFire DatasetPlanning.GIS.STATIONS
descript.purpose: To geographically depict the location of Fire Stations and their associated data

idinfo.accconst: This layer is read only and is not availble to the public.
idinfo.useconst: This data layer is not provided by Gaston County at this time.

cntorgp.cntorg: Gaston County Planning and Emergency Management

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
